page.title: 07Lifestyle-Bolton by Bowland
page.content: There are 2{residential pubs}in our village,serving lunches,snacks and dinners.They have a dining room which is busy at weekends and in the summer. The{school house}sells drinks,biscuits and sandwiches in the summer. The{village hall}is always busy with Whist and Domino drives,Bingo,concerts and Jumble Sales.Also each month NADFAS give a talk on antiques and paintings etc. Twice a year in the village there is {Terrier and Whippet racing. Flea Markets are held occasionally in the year they sell things that people do not want any more. Once a year there is a Garden Party, to raise funds for charities. In Bolton Park there is a{duck {and pheasant shoot}every 2 weeks in the Autumn and Winter.
